name: Lost Borderline
description:
There have been rumors of strange creatures lurking in the woods. Creatures no one has seen, only heard of in legends. A lone huntress uncovers the mysteries of an ancient civilization deep beneath the ground where the rules of reality don't apply.Key Features
  • Slash, dash, and shoot your way through 30 monster-filled rooms.
  • Explore handcrafted environments.
  • Warp through the edge of the screen to solve mazes and puzzles throughout the crystal catacombs.
